text: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity
author: Sun Tzu

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans
author: John Lennon

text: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world usually just do
author: Steve Jobs

text: Chaos isn’t a pit. Chaos is a ladder
author: Petyr Baelish

text: If you stare into the abyss long enough, it starts posting memes back
author: Anonymous

text: We live in a simulation, but at least the graphics are decent
author: Reddit Sage

text: The sky calls to us. If we do not destroy ourselves, we will one day venture to the stars
author: Carl Sagan

text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality
author: Seneca

text: The world’s gone mad. Might as well be the one writing the script
author: Unknown
